info.title: Navigate backwards to a tab panel

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterTabpanel
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the tab panel
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the tab panel
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the tab panel. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the tab panel.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the tab panel. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the tab panel.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Textual content of the tab panel is conveyed as 'Nils Frahm is a German musician, composer and record producer based in Berlin. He is known for combining classical and electronic music and for an unconventional approach to the piano in which he mixes a grand piano, upright piano, Roland Juno-60, Rhodes piano, drum machine, and Moog Taurus.'
